title: FTX’s Solana sell-off triggers 7% price drop in crypto asset
description:
Solana’s price fell by around 7% during the last 24 hours after bankrupt FTX transferred 250,000 SOL tokens, worth approximately $14 million, to the Kraken crypto exchange on Nov. 13, according to on-chain data. Blockchain analytical firm Peckshield corroborated this report, adding that FTX also transferred $3.99 million USDT to Binance and Wintermute during the […]

The post FTX’s Solana sell-off triggers 7% price drop in crypto asset appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Ripple Partners With Onafriq to Enable Faster Cross Border Payments to Africa
description: Ripple and the Africa-focused payment fintech startup Onafriq recently said they are collaborating to enable crypto-based cross-border payments between Africa and the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC), the U.K., and Australia. Using Ripple’s platform helps Onafriq achieve its goal of making borders “matter less when it comes to payment within, to, and from Africa.” Accelerating Financial […]

title: Rootstock Grants Program Opens Wave 3: $2.5 Million for Groundbreaking Crypto Projects
description: London, United Kingdom, November 14th, 2023, Chainwire The Rootstock Grants Program, a trailblazing initiative within the cryptocurrency landscape has committed a further $2.5 million towards funding a new wave of ground-breaking projects that are built on Rootstock, the world’s first Bitcoin Sidechain.  The exciting initiative stems from the desire to further the growth and development ... title: Tech Leaders Embrace Generative AI for Cyber Defense: PwC Report
description: As the cybersecurity landscape evolves, a PwC report reveals that 70% of tech and business leaders plan to adopt Generative AI for cyber defense in the next 12 months. This shift comes in response to the increasing sophistication of cyber threats, driven by Generative AI’s capacity to craft convincing business emails on a large scale. ... Read more

title: Amazon Announces Second Round of Layoffs in Gaming Divisions
description: Tech giant Amazon has made headlines once again with its announcement of a second round of layoffs in its gaming divisions, impacting over 180 employees. This move comes on the heels of recent cutbacks in the company’s music streaming section, as Amazon aims to restructure and streamline its operations. In an effort to adapt to ... Read more

title: The Evolution of Virtual Reality Gaming
description: Virtual reality gaming has undergone remarkable advancements, propelling it into an era of unparalleled immersion and innovation. This article delves into the cutting-edge technologies shaping this gaming landscape, from the fusion of reality and the virtual realm in augmented reality (AR) to the tactile revolution brought by haptic feedback. It explores the newfound freedom of ... Read more

title: Coinbase warns against hasty analysis of Bitcoin ETF flows
description: An analyst at Coinbase says there are at least three reasons why tracking cash flow into spot Bitcoin ETFs at launch will give no valuable insights for the long term. While spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded funds (ETFs) have the opportunity…

title: Polygon Labs reveals updated web3 identification service
description: The Polygon project has launched the fifth version of Polygon ID, a service for identification in the web3 space. The tool allows dapps to verify user data without revealing their personal information. Polygon (MATIC) ID enables identity reuse and interoperability. Once the…

title: Cardano Unveils Ledger Sync: A Game-Changer for Developers
description: Ledger Sync, a Java-based data provisioning tool, aims to enhance the development experience for applications on the Cardano blockchain. The open-source framework addresses inefficiencies in data retrieval associated with linked list storage, offering improved accessibility for developers. The Cardano Foundation has unveiled a new data provisioning tool based on Java, aiming to improve the development [...]

title: A Review into the Binance Messenger App and Wallet Service
description:
Binance recently extended its services and launched a new communication tool known as the “Binance Messenger App.” The app is currently on the Apple Store for download but requires an invitation for new users to register. Binance believes the new tool will help bring in the next wave of users to its platform. Let’s discover […]

title: Crypto Prices Today: BTC Decline Opens Door for Altcoins To Shine
description:
Bitcoin’s (BTC) price has dropped along with the global market cap in the past 24 hours. At press time, CoinMarketCap indicated that the total market cap stood at $1.4 trillion after it experienced a 0.38% decline since yesterday. BTC’s recent decline could, however, open some doors for tokens like Polygon (MATIC), Memecoin (MEME), and Big […]

The post Crypto Prices Today: BTC Decline Opens Door for Altcoins To Shine appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Blockchain Expo Global 2023: Uniting Pioneering Innovators Worldwide in the Heart of London
description:
Blockchain Expo Global is set to take place on November 30th – December 1st, 2023, at The Olympia, London. This event will bring together industry leaders, innovators, and enthusiasts from around the globe to explore the latest trends in the Blockchain ecosystem. The event includes industry-leading technology companies, giving attendees the opportunity to discover the […]
